channel.title: Top Skills
channel.description:
I made a HighScores.
Now, I want to make a Top Skills. This is like a list with all the top #1 in each skills. Example:
Attack: Trye Strength: Wert67 Defence: 12gd12
I want to know how to retake the names and put them there. It needs to update everytime someone gets first.
Please, help me.
Thanks.

item.title: Top Skills
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Maybe an hour, or two at the most.

It depends.

I’ll help you when I get home/
[/quote]

When do you get at home ? In how many time ?[/quote]

Okay. I might not be on computer in two hours. Anyway, can you help me a little on Mopar for now ?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:5, topic:353163”]You said you used Deaths’… :s

Though, I assume it is config.[/quote]

I use Deaths’ but it’s his old one. Not the Jagex one.
Query: “$query = mysql_query (“SELECT * FROM skillsoverall ORDER BY lvl DESC”) or die(mysql_error());” ?

item.title: Top Skills
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:4, topic:353163”]There’s queries in the functions.php file.

They scan the database, get the results, and sort the data.[/quote]

Mine isn’t the Jagex one. It’s the old one with like config.php, gif.php, mysql.php, images, images.html, ect.

So, functions.php is like config.php I guess ?

item.title: Top Skills
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:2, topic:353163”]Did you ‘make’ the highscores like you said, or did you use Deathschaos9’s files?

If you used Deaths’ just add on to the broswe list, add an extra function, and change the sort order for the query.[/quote]

Deathschaos9’s files. But that’s not the RuneScape Jagex one. That’s the old one and it’s better when you personalize it yourself.

And yeah, I want to learn from this. Please, I really need help.

Read full topic

item.title: Top Skills
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You mean you followed the tutorial? Because if you had made the highscores yourself you would be able to do this.

Hint - It’s easier than highscores, and you can use the tables you already made in MySQL.
